4. Bryce Morgan

## Bryce Morgan

### Council Member

## Biography

Bryce Morgan was born and raised in Burley by Lynn and Lorraine Morgan. Bryce loves living in Burley so much that he is raising his family here. Morgan is committed to helping Burley continue to be a great place to raise a family. Morgan and his wife have six children. Morgan has a vested interest in Burley to ensure that his children are safe and have opportunities to learn and develop.Â 

Bryce has a Master's Degree in Business Administration and a Bachelor's Degree in Accounting. Morgan has worked the last 20 years in the transportation industry for Handy Truck Line.
